revised_title: Absolute Determination of Gravity: A New Method and Apparatus
tldr: The authors describe a new method and apparatus for determining the absolute value of the acceleration due to gravity with greater accuracy than previously possible. They used a reversible pendulum with a non-magnetic light alloy I-section rod and a precision chronograph for time measurement. This method improved the accuracy of gravity measurements and had implications for determining the absolute unit of electric current using a current balance.
